scripts.dev-db: export SD_MODE=dev&&export SD_PORT=8080&& nodemon -r esm start.js
scripts.db: export SD_MODE=prod&&export SD_PORT=443&& node -r esm start.js
scripts.dev-site: ./dev_views.sh && npm run pack && npm run dev-db
scripts.site: ./prod_views.sh && npm run pack && npm run db
scripts.test-api: export SD_MODE=dev&& export SD_PORT=8080&& node -r esm functionTest.js
scripts.test-speed: export SD_MODE=dev&& export SD_PORT=8080&& node -r esm speedTest.js
scripts.up: rm package-lock.json && rm -rf node_modules && npm upgrade && npm i && npm run pack
scripts.tscheck-client: tsc --types node,./node_modules/@stripe/stripe-js/types --target ES2020 --checkJs --allowJs --outFile typetests/client.js --module System public/src/*.js public/src/decs.d.ts public/src/web_modules/decs.d.ts
scripts.tscheck-server: tsc --target ES2020 --checkJs --allowJs --outFile typetests/server.js --module System server.js decs.d.ts
scripts.tscheck: npm run tscheck-server && npm run tscheck-client
scripts.check: ( npm run tscheck || : ) && npm run lint
